main.name: Apoorv Goel
main.description: I aspire to make lives easier using technology.
main.bio: I graduated with a B.Tech in computer engineering from Delhi Technological University in July 2020. Besides programming for embedded systems (which I do profesionally), my skills involve making machines see and interact with the world.
